Steam (ST): After dashing to her bedroom, Jessica answered the phone call that had been transferred there.
Umineko Project (UP): After dashing to her bedroom, Jessica answered the phone call that had been transferred there.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 朱志香は自分の部屋に駆け戻ってくると、転送した電話を取る。
Russian (RU): Влетев в свою спальню, Джессика ответила на телефонный звонок, переадресованный туда.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após correr para o seu quarto, Jessica atendeu o telefonema que havia sido transferido para lá.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 朱志香飛快地跑回自己的房間，接起了轉接進來的電話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 朱志香飞快地跑回自己的房间，接起了转接进来的电话。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver corso nella sua camera, Jessica rispose alla chiamata che era stata trasferita là.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Ah, hello?! Sorry to keep you waiting! Battler! What'd ya think you're doing, not contacting us for six years?! How's it goiiiiiiiing?! Oh, really? How the hell'd I know?! Heh, shut up! Ahhahahahahahaha! So, that means you'll be coming to this year's family conference, right? I mean, it's been six whole years!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Ah, hello?! Sorry to keep you waiting! Battle~r! What d'ya think you're doing, not contacting us for six years?! How's it goi{-}i{-}i{-}i{-}i{-}i{-}i{-}ing?! Oh, really? How the hell would I know?! Cram it, you jackass! Ahha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha! So you'll be coming to this year's family conference? It's been six years!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Ah, hello?! Sorry to keep you waiting! Battle~r! What'd ya think you're doing, not contacting us for six years?! How's it goiiiiiiiing?! Oh, really? How the hell'd I know?! Heh, shut up! Ahhahahahahahaha! So you'll be coming to this year's family conference? It's been six years!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「あーもしもし？！　お待たせー！戦人ぁ〜！　６年も音沙汰無しとはどういうつもりだ！　ひっさしぶりだなぁああ！ん、そうなのか？　知るかよそんなの！うぜーぜ！　あっははははははは！　じゃあ、今年の親族会議はちゃんと来るわけだろ？　６年ぶりだなぁ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あーもしもし？！　お待たせー！　戦人ぁ〜！　６年も音沙汰無しとはどういうつもりだ！　ひっさしぶりだなぁああ！　ん、そうなのか？　知るかよそんなの！　うぜーぜ！　あっははははははは！　じゃあ、今年の親族会議はちゃんと来るわけだろ？　６年ぶりだなぁ！」
Russian (RU): "О, алло?! Извините, что так долго! Ба~ттлер! О чём ты думал, не связываясь с нами шесть лет?! Как дела‐а‐а?! О, правда? Откуда мне знать?! Хех, заткнись! Аха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха! Так ты приедешь на семейное собрание этого года? Шесть лет прошло!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, oi?! Desculpa a demora! Battle~r! Que que tu acha que tá fazendo, ficando sem dar notícias por seis anos?! Já faz um tempão, né?! Ah, mesmo? Como eu ia saber?! Fica quietooo! Ahha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}ha{0}haha! Então, vai vir na conferência familiar desse ano? Já faz seis anos!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊——喂喂？！久等久等——！戰人～！你怎麼回事呀，6 年來毫無音信！好久不見了啊——！嗯，是麼？誰理你啊！煩死嘞！啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！那麼，今年的親族會議是會好好到場的嘍？相隔 6 年了啊！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊——喂喂？！久等久等——！战人～！你怎么回事呀，6 年来毫无音信！好久不见了啊——！嗯，是么？谁理你啊！烦死嘞！啊、哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！那么，今年的亲族会议是会好好到场的喽？相隔 6 年了啊！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ah, pronto?! Scusa per averti fatto aspettare! Battle{p:0:～}r! Non ci hai contattato per sei anni, cosa pensavi di fare?! Come vaaaaaaa?! Oh, sul serio? Come diavolo facevo a saperlo?! Sta' zitto! Ahhahahahahahaha! Quindi verrai alla riunione di famiglia di quest'anno, giusto? Sono passati sei anni!"

Steam (ST): Five businessmen in expensive suits were visiting in the parlor, giving Krauss and Natsuhi a progress report on their business.
Umineko Project (UP): Five businessmen in expensive suits were visiting in the parlor, giving Krauss and Natsuhi a progress report on their business.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 客間には、高級スーツ姿の実業家が５人も訪れていて、蔵臼と夏妃に事業の進捗報告をしていた。
Russian (RU): Пятеро бизнесменов в дорогих костюмах расположились в гостиной и докладывали Крауссу и Нацухи о прогрессе своей деятельности.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Cinco homens de negócios, vestindo ternos caros, estavam sendo recebidos na sala de visitas, informando Krauss e Natsuhi sobre o andamento de seus negócios.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在客廳中，有五位身著高級西服的實業家到訪，在向藏臼與夏妃報告事業的進展狀況。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在客厅中，有五位身着高级西服的实业家到访，在向藏臼与夏妃报告事业的进展状况。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Cinque uomini d'affari con degli abiti costosi erano in visita nel salotto, dando a Krauss e a Natsuhi un rapporto sui progressi dei loro affari.

Steam (ST): Spread out on the table were the blueprints and designs for a building, as well as documents related to expenditures and the like, ...so packed that even a tea cup would have gotten in the way.
Umineko Project (UP): Spread out on the table were the blueprints and designs for a building, as well as documents related to expenditures and the like...so packed that even a tea cup would have gotten in the way.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Spread out on the table were the blueprints and designs for a building, as well as documents related to expenditures and the like... so packed that even a tea cup would have gotten in the way.
PC Japanese (JP): テーブルの上には、ビルの図面や計画、収支などの資料が広げられ、紅茶のカップさえも邪魔だと言いたげだった。
Russian (RU): Разложенные на столе чертежи и проекты зданий, а также документы, связанные с расходами и тому подобным, занимали столько места, что даже чашку чая было некуда поставить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Espalhadas pela mesa estavam plantas de designs para um prédio, bem como documentos sobre as despesas e coisas similares...tão abarrotada de coisas que mesmo uma xícara de chá ali acabaria atrapalhando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 桌上鋪著大廈藍圖，與計劃、收支等等的資料，就連紅茶茶杯都可以說占地方礙事了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 桌上铺着大厦蓝图，与计划、收支等等的资料，就连红茶茶杯都可以说占地方碍事了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sparsi sul tavolo, vi erano i progetti e i modelli per un palazzo, insieme a documenti legati alle spese e affini... talmente stipati che persino una tazza di tè sarebbe stata d'intralcio.

Steam (ST): Officially, they were here to give Krauss a progress report, ...but in actuality, Krauss had called them all the way over to Rokkenjima so that Natsuhi could hear from them directly.
Umineko Project (UP): Officially, they were here to give Krauss a progress report, ......but in actuality, Krauss had called them all the way over to Rokkenjima so that Natsuhi could hear from them directly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Officially, they were here to give Krauss a progress report, ......but in actuality, Krauss had called them all the way over to Rokkenjima so that Natsuhi could hear from them directly.
PC Japanese (JP): 表向きは蔵臼への進捗報告となっているが、……実際は、蔵臼が夏妃に聞かせるために、彼らをわざわざ六軒島へ招いたのだった。
Russian (RU): По официальной версии они были здесь, чтобы отчитаться Крауссу о прогрессе...... но на самом деле приехали на Роккенджиму лично рассказать всё Нацухи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Oficialmente, eles estavam aqui para informar Krauss sobre o relatório de progresso, ......mas, na verdade, havia sido Krauss quem chamou todos até Rokkenjima para que Natsuhi pudesse ouvir diretamente de suas bocas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然表面上是向藏臼報告進展狀況，……但實際上，是藏臼為了令夏妃聽聽情況，而專程把他們請到六軒島來的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然表面上是向藏臼报告进展状况，……但实际上，是藏臼为了令夏妃听听情况，而专程把他们请到六轩岛来的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ufficialmente, erano là per dare a Krauss un rapporto sui progressi... ma in realtà, Krauss li aveva convocati addirittura su Rokkenjima affinché Natsuhi potesse sentirli direttamente.

Steam (ST): This was because Natsuhi needed to hear someone other than her husband explain what condition their business was in.
Umineko Project (UP): This was because Natsuhi needed to hear someone other than her husband explain what condition their business was in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This was because Natsuhi needed to hear someone other than her husband explain what condition their business was in.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃に、事業がどういう状況にあるのか、蔵臼以外の人間から説明する必要が生じたためである。
Russian (RU): Ей нужно было, чтобы кто‐нибудь кроме мужа объяснил ей текущее положение дел.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso tudo porque Natsuhi precisava que outra pessoa, além de seu marido, explicasse as condições do negócio que ele estava metido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而這是因為，產生了需要讓除藏臼外的人給夏妃說明，事業處於怎樣狀況的必要。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而这是因为，产生了需要让除藏臼外的人给夏妃说明，事业处于怎样状况的必要。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciò perché Natsuhi aveva bisogno di sentire qualcun altro, oltre a suo marito, che spiegasse in che condizioni erano i loro affari.

Steam (ST): ...In other words, even though another family conference without Kinzo was approaching, their business had not yet earned them any money.
Umineko Project (UP): ......In short, even though another family conference without Kinzo was approaching, their business had not yet earned them any money.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……つまり、金蔵不在の親族会議が、再び近付きつつあったにもかかわらず、未だに事業はカネを生み出せずにいたのだ。
Russian (RU): ......В общем, несмотря на приближение ещё одного семейного собрания без Кинзо, их дела так и не принесли им денег.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Resumindo, mesmo que outra conferência familiar sem Kinzo estivesse se aproximando, os negócios dele ainda não haviam rendido nenhum tostão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這也就代表著，儘管沒有金藏的親族會議再次臨近，可事業卻還沒創造出金錢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这也就代表着，尽管没有金藏的亲族会议再次临近，可事业却还没创造出金钱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In pratica, anche se si stava avvicinando un'altra riunione familiare senza Kinzo, i loro affari non avevano procurato loro alcun guadagno.

Steam (ST): After telling the guests to wait for a short while, Krauss took Natsuhi out into the hall and once again summarized the situation...
Umineko Project (UP): After telling the guests to wait for a short while and make themselves at home, Krauss took Natsuhi out into the hall and once again summarized the situation...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After telling the guests to wait for a short while, Krauss took Natsuhi out into the hall and once again summarized the situation...
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は、来客たちにしばしくつろぐように伝えると、廊下に夏妃を連れ出し、状況を再び要約して説明した…。
Russian (RU): Сказав гостям немного подождать, Краусс вывел Нацухи в коридор и ещё раз объяснил ситуацию...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após dizer aos convidados para aguardarem e se sentirem em casa, Krauss levou Natsuhi para fora da sala e mais uma vez resumiu a situação...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼對來客說了“請稍等片刻，不必拘束”，把夏妃帶到了走廊上，簡明扼要地重新說明了遍狀況…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼对来客说了“请稍等片刻，不必拘束”，把夏妃带到了走廊上，简明扼要地重新说明了遍状况…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver detto agli ospiti di aspettare per un momento, Krauss portò Natsuhi fuori nell'atrio e riassunse un'altra volta la situazione...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "...In short, they say the work is proceeding even better than we imagined. This is where my personal connection to the governor really starts to pay off! By now, it's absolutely impossible for this catch to get away from us. To the contrary, it's growing so big that in one go, we'll be able to regain not just that power of attorney, but everything we've lost up to this point as well!"
Umineko Project (UP): "......In short, they are saying that the business is proceeding much better than we imagined it would. This is where that personal connection between me and the governor is really starting to pay off! There is no possible way for this catch to get away from us now. To the contrary, it's growing so big that in one go, we'll be able to regain not just that power of attorney, but everything we've lost up to this point as well!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......In short, they are saying that the business is proceeding much better than we imagined it would. This is where that personal connection between me and the governor is really starting to pay off! By now, it is certainly impossible for this catch to get away from us. To the contrary, it's growing so big that in one go, we'll be able to regain not just that power of attorney, but everything we've lost up to this point as well!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……つまり、我々の想像をはるかに超えて、事業は素晴らしくうまく行っていると彼らは言っているのだ。ここで私と知事との私的なコネクションが大きく利いてきた！　もはや絶対に釣り落とすことはない。それどころか、例の委任状だけでなく、これまでの損失さえも一気に取り戻すことが可能なくらいの大きな話になりつつあるのだ！」
Russian (RU): "......Короче говоря, они сказали, что дела продвигаются гораздо лучше, чем мы предполагали. Личная связь между мной и губернатором действительно начинает окупаться! Теперь такой улов ни за что от нас не ускользнёт. Наоборот, он станет настолько крупным, что мы сразу же сможем вернуть не только доверенность, но и всё, что потеряли!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......De forma direta, eles estão dizendo que o empreendimento está prosseguindo muito melhor do que o esperado. É aqui que a minha conexão pessoal com o governador começa a mostrar sua eficácia! Não há mais nada que possa fazer isso dar errado agora. Pelo contrário, está crescendo cada vez mais e seremos capazes de, não apenas reavermos a procuração, mas também tudo que perdemos até agora!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……總而言之，他們在講的是，遠超我們的想像，事業進行得前景似錦十分順利。在這個階段，我與知事的私交已開始發揮巨大的作用！大魚已經絕對不會溜走。豈止如此，不僅僅是那份委托書，甜頭漸漸地將會大到，連之前的所有損失都有可能一口氣賺回來！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……总而言之，他们在讲的是，远超我们的想象，事业进行得前景似锦十分顺利。在这个阶段，我与知事的私交已开始发挥巨大的作用！大鱼已经绝对不会溜走。岂止如此，不仅仅是那份委托书，甜头渐渐地将会大到，连之前的所有损失都有可能一口气赚回来！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In parole povere, stanno dicendo che gli affari stanno procedendo molto meglio di quanto avevamo immaginato. Ora l'amicizia tra me e il governatore ci sta davvero ripagando! In questo momento, è davvero impossibile che questa possibilità ci sfugga. Al contrario, sta crescendo così tanto che in un sol colpo potremo riottenere non solo quei documenti di procura, ma anche tutto ciò che abbiamo perso sino a questo punto!"

Steam (ST): Krauss spoke passionately.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss spoke passionately.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は熱っぽく語る。
Russian (RU): Звучно произнёс Краусс.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss falou entusiasmado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼略顯激動地講著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼略显激动地讲着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss parlò ardentemente.

Steam (ST): ...This made it seem all the more suspicious to Natsuhi, but this time, at least, she had to admit that everything really did seem to be going well.
Umineko Project (UP): ......This made things seem all the more suspicious to Natsuhi, but this time, at least, she had to admit that everything really did seem to be going well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……むしろその仕草が胡散臭さを掻き立てるのだが、今回に限り、実際に順調であることを夏妃も認めざるを得なかった。
Russian (RU): ......Из‐за этого Нацухи всё казалось только подозрительнее, но на сей раз ей, по крайней мере, пришлось признать, что дела идут хорошо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O que só fez tudo parecer ainda mais suspeito para Natsuhi, mas, ao menos dessa vez, ela precisava admitir que tudo realmente estava correndo bem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖然他這副樣子反而令人起疑，但就這次來說，夏妃也不得不認可，實際上是進行得很順利。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽然他这副样子反而令人起疑，但就这次来说，夏妃也不得不认可，实际上是进行得很顺利。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ciò fece sembrare le cose ancora più sospette per Natsuhi, ma questa volta, almeno, doveva ammettere che tutto sembrava andare bene sul serio.

Steam (ST): Certainly, this business Krauss boasted of had expanded in scope over the last year... and was promising an even greater payoff than had been anticipated initially.
Umineko Project (UP): Certainly, this business Krauss boasted of had expanded in scope over the last year, and was promising an even greater payoff than had been anticipated in the beginning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Certainly, this business Krauss boasted of had expanded in scope over the last year, and was promising an even greater payoff than had been anticipated in the beginning.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに蔵臼が豪語した事業は、この一年でさらに規模が大きくなり、当初の見込みを大幅に上回る利益を約束しつつあった。
Russian (RU): Да, бизнес, о котором хвастался Краусс, расширился за прошлый год и обещал даже большую выплату, чем ожидалось в начале.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente, o investimento que Krauss tanto se gabou se expandiu em um escopo durante o ano passado, e prometia um pagamento ainda maior do que ele havia antecipado no começo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，通過這一年，藏臼誇口過的事業的規模變得更大，正漸漸有望得到大大超過當初所預計的利潤。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，通过这一年，藏臼夸口过的事业的规模变得更大，正渐渐有望得到大大超过当初所预计的利润。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Certamente, questo affare di cui Krauss si vantava si era espanso in portata nell'ultimo anno, e stava promettendo una ricompensa ancora più grande di quanto era stato anticipato all'inizio.

Steam (ST): Whether it would prove to be a winner or not, investors had gathered around it, and they were rapidly gaining funds.
Umineko Project (UP): Investors were gathering, jumping on the bandwagon of their own accord, and the business was rapidly gathering funds.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Whether it proved to be a winner or not, investors had gathered around it, and they were rapidly gaining funds.
PC Japanese (JP): 勝ち馬には放って置いても出資者が集まり、資金が見る見る集まる。
Russian (RU): Выйдет он победителем или нет, инвесторы уже собрались и быстрыми темпами собирают фонды.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Investidores estão se reunindo em um efeito de adesão, e os negócio estavam obtendo fundos rapidamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 會獲勝的馬，即便放著不管，也會自然而然地聚集出資者，資金眼看著越聚越多。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 会获胜的马，即便放着不管，也会自然而然地聚集出资者，资金眼看着越聚越多。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nonostante potesse provare di essere un vincitore o meno, degli investitori si erano riuniti attorno ad esso, e stavano rapidamente ottenendo fondi.

Steam (ST): This must be what they mean when they say money summons money.
Umineko Project (UP): It was a perfect example of the saying "money makes money".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): This must be what they mean when they say that money summons money.
PC Japanese (JP): カネがカネを呼ぶとはまさにこのことだろう。
Russian (RU): Наверное, это имеют в виду, когда говорят, что деньги притягивают деньги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era um perfeito exemplo de como dizer "dinheiro faz dinheiro".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 錢會喚來錢，說的就正是此吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 钱会唤来钱，说的就正是此吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Questo dev'essere ciò che significa quando si dice che i soldi chiamano altri soldi.

Steam (ST): It was probably the greatest success of Krauss's life so far. ...No, it probably {i:would be} his greatest success yet.
Umineko Project (UP): This was probably the greatest success of Krauss's life so far. ......No, it probably {i:would become} his greatest success yet.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was probably the greatest success of Krauss's life so far.......No, it probably would become his greatest success yet.
PC Japanese (JP): 恐らく、蔵臼のこれまでの人生で、もっとも成功した、……いや、成功する事業と{i:なる}だろう。
Russian (RU): Это, пожалуй, наивысший успех за всю жизнь Краусса. ......Нет, в том‐то и дело, что пока {i:никакого} успеха ещё нет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Este era, possivelmente, o maior sucesso da vida de Krauss. ......Não, ele provavelmente iria {i:se tornar} o seu maior sucesso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 恐怕，這是在藏臼迄今為止的人生中，最為成功的，……不，是{i:將}會成為最為成功的一樁事業吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 恐怕，这是在藏臼迄今为止的人生中，最为成功的，……不，是{i:将}会成为最为成功的一桩事业吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Probabilmente, era il più grande successo nella vita di Krauss fino a quel momento. ... No, forse sarebbe diventato il suo più grande successo.

Steam (ST): That point was where Natsuhi's misgivings lay.
Umineko Project (UP): That point was where Natsuhi's misgivings lay.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That point was where Natsuhi's misgivings lay.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃が危惧するのはその一点だった。
Russian (RU): Вот чего опасалась Нацухи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, a desconfiança de Natsuhi ainda permanecia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃怕的就是這一點。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃怕的就是这一点。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era quello il punto in cui giacevano i dubbi di Natsuhi.

Steam (ST): True, it was certain, and as Krauss had said, they wouldn't lose this catch now.
Umineko Project (UP): True, it was certain, and as Krauss had said, they wouldn't lose this catch now.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): True, it was certain, and as Krauss had said, they wouldn't lose this catch now.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに確実な話で、蔵臼が言うように、もはや釣り落とすことはない。
Russian (RU): Да, он был возможен, и, как сказал Краусс, они не упустят этот улов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): De fato, era uma certeza, e Krauss já havia dito; ele não iria perder agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，確鑿無誤，一如藏臼所說，魚已不會溜走。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，确凿无误，一如藏臼所说，鱼已不会溜走。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di sicuro, era una cosa certa, e come aveva detto Krauss, non avrebbero lasciato ora la presa.

Steam (ST): However, ......the fish on the line had gotten too big.
Umineko Project (UP): However, .........the fish on the line had gotten too big.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, .........the fish on the line had gotten too big.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、………掛かった魚が大きくなり過ぎたのだ。
Russian (RU): Но......... им попалась на крючок слишком крупная рыба.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, .........o peixe pego pela vara era grande demais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，………上鈎的魚實在有點變得太大了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，………上钩的鱼实在有点变得太大了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciononostante... il pesce che aveva abboccato era diventato troppo grande.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "We'll definitely be able to reel this fish in. There's no need to rush. It's such a success that I wish I could show it to Father, if he were still alive...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "We'll definitely be able to reel this fish in. There's no need to rush. It's such a success that I wish I could show it to Dad to be praised, if he were still alive...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "We'll definitely be able to reel this fish in. There's no need to rush. It's such a success that I wish I could show it to Father to be praised, if he were still alive...!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「必ず釣り上げられる魚だ。何も焦る必要はないのだよ。親父が生きていたなら、ぜひ見せて誇りたいほどの大成功なのだ…！」
Russian (RU): "И мы обязательно вытянем её. Не нужно спешить. Это такой успех, что даже отец мог бы похвалить меня, будь он жив!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Definitivamente iremos puxar esse peixe. Não há motivos para nos apressarmos. É tanto sucesso que eu gostaria de poder mostrar para o pai só para ele me elogiar, se ainda estivesse vivo...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這魚，一定釣得上來。啥都不用急。這是爸如果還活著，就絕對要自豪地給他看看的大獲成功…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这鱼，一定钓得上来。啥都不用急。这是爸如果还活着，就绝对要自豪地给他看看的大获成功…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Riusciremo sicuramente a catturare questo pesce. Non c'è bisogno di affrettarsi. È un tale successo che vorrei poterlo mostrare a mio Padre per essere lodato, se fosse ancora vivo...!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Yes, I know. However, I believe you made me a promise last year. You said you were sure you could manage something within a year...!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, I know. However, I believe you made me a promise last year. You said you were sure you could manage something within a year...!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇ、それはわかっています。ですが、あなたは昨年、私に約束したはずです。必ず、１年で何とか出来ると…！」
Russian (RU): "Да, знаю. Но, мне кажется, ты обещал другое в прошлом году. Ты сказал, что сможешь сделать что‐нибудь в течение года!.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, eu sei. Contudo, eu acredito que você me fez uma promessa ano passado. Você disse que daria um jeito de conseguir algo este ano...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，這個我明白。但是，老公在去年應該有向我保證過。必定會在這一年中設法辦妥…！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，这个我明白。但是，老公在去年应该有向我保证过。必定会在这一年中设法办妥…！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, lo so. Comunque, credo che tu mi abbia fatto una promessa l'anno scorso. Hai detto di essere sicuro di poter sistemare qualcosa entro un anno...!"

Steam (ST): A pained look rose to Krauss's face. They certainly had hooked a fat fish that guaranteed great success.
Umineko Project (UP): A pained look rose to Krauss's face. They certainly had hooked a fat fish that guaranteed a great success.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼は苦い顔をする。大成果を保証する肥えた魚を、確かに彼らは釣ってはいる。
Russian (RU): Краусс выглядел огорчённым. Они, несомненно, поймали жирную рыбу, гарантирующую большой успех.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Uma dolorosa expressão subiu ao rosto de Krauss. Eles certamente haviam pegado um peixe dos grandes com garantias de sucesso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼露出了困窘的表情。他們的確是釣到了，保證了巨大成果的肥魚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼露出了困窘的表情。他们的确是钓到了，保证了巨大成果的肥鱼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sul volto di Krauss affiorò un'espressione addolorata. Avevano certamente preso all'amo un grosso pesce che avrebbe garantito un grande successo.

Steam (ST): However, it would require an appropriate amount of time to reel it in...
Umineko Project (UP): However, it would require an appropriate amount of time to reel it in......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, it would require an appropriate amount of time to reel it in......
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、引き上げるには、それに相応しい時間が必要になるのだ……。
Russian (RU): Вот только потребуется уйма времени, чтобы намотать её на крючок......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, isto iria requerer uma certa quantidade de tempo até que pudesse girar o molinete......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，要收竿，是需要與此相應的時間的……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，要收竿，是需要与此相应的时间的……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, ci sarebbe stato bisogno di un'appropriata quantità di tempo per ottenerlo...

Steam (ST): Natsuhi pressed Krauss, asking if there was any way for them to make money before this year's family conference, but Krauss kept saying that he needed just one more year...
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi pressed Krauss, asking if there was any way for them to make money before this year's family conference, but Krauss kept saying that he needed just one more year...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi pressed Krauss, asking if there was any way for them to make money before this year's family conference, but Krauss kept saying that he needed just one more year...
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃は何とか今年の親族会議までにカネを作れないのかと蔵臼を問い詰めるが、蔵臼は、あともう１年だけ待って欲しいと繰り返す…。
Russian (RU): Нацухи давила на Краусса, спрашивая, есть ли другой способ заработать деньги до наступления семейной конференции этого года, а Краусс твердил, что ему просто нужен ещё год...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi pressionou Krauss, perguntando se não havia outra forma de fazer dinheiro antes da conferência familiar deste ano, mas Krauss continuava dizendo que precisaria de só mais um ano...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然夏妃在逼問藏臼，就不能設法在今年的親族會議之前搞到錢嗎？但藏臼只是反覆地說，希望能再多等個一年…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然夏妃在逼问藏臼，就不能设法在今年的亲族会议之前搞到钱吗？但藏臼只是反复地说，希望能再多等个一年…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Natsuhi fece pressione su Krauss, chiedendogli se esistesse un modo per guadagnare prima della riunione familiare di quell'anno, ma Krauss continuò a dire che gli serviva un altro anno...

Steam (ST): Krauss planned to use this unprecedented success to catapult them into further challenges in the future.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss planned to use this unprecedented success...as a springboard to future endeavors.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss planned to use this unprecedented success to catapult them into further challenges in the future.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼としては、この空前の成功を切っ掛けに、未来の新しい挑戦への踏み台にしたいという目論見がある。
Russian (RU): Он планировал однажды катапультой забросить этот небывалый успех в будущие проблемы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss planejava usar esse sucesso sem precedentes...como um trampolim para investimentos futuros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 站在藏臼的立場上，是有著一個，希望以這個空前成功為契機，將此化為通往未來新挑戰的跳板的如意算盤的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 站在藏臼的立场上，是有着一个，希望以这个空前成功为契机，将此化为通往未来新挑战的跳板的如意算盘的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Krauss intendeva usare questo successo senza precedenti per catapultarli in nuove sfide in futuro.

Steam (ST): Because of this, he didn't want to do anything that would raise suspicions by making it seem like they were rushing to get money...
Umineko Project (UP): Because of this, he didn't want to do anything that would raise suspicions by making it seem like they were rushing to get money...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because of this, he didn't want to do anything that would raise suspicions by making it seem like they were rushing to get money...
PC Japanese (JP): そのため、おかしな金策で奔走していることで、妙な不信感を持たれたくないという気持ちがあるのだ…。
Russian (RU): Из‐за этого ему не хотелось делать ничего подозрительного, чтобы не показалось, будто они гонятся за деньгами...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, ele não queria fazer nada que levantasse suspeitas, fazendo parecer que ele estava apressando as coisas para conseguir dinheiro...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此，他不想因奔走籌集無正當理由的資金，給人留下多餘的疑惑…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此，他不想因奔走筹集无正当理由的资金，给人留下多余的疑惑…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A causa di ciò, non voleva fare qualcosa che avrebbe sollevato sospetti facendo sembrare che si stessero affrettando per avere soldi...

Steam (ST): Certainly, fortune tends to turn against people who take it for granted even in the slightest. Anxious beggars never prosper...
Umineko Project (UP): Certainly, fortune tends to turn against people who take it for granted even in the slightest.{n}There's a saying about hasty anglers......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Certainly, fortune tends to turn against people who take it for granted even in the slightest. Like by anxiously begging for money......
PC Japanese (JP): 確かに、運気というのは小さなケチで転ぶこともある。慌てる乞食は何とやら……。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 確かに、運気というのは小さなケチで転ぶこともある。{n}急いては事を何とやら……。
Russian (RU): Удача всегда стремится отвернуться от людей, которые хотя бы немного воспринимают её как должное.{n}Например, от тех, кто с тревогой ищет деньги......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Certamente, a sorte tende a se virar contra as pessoas que acabam tomando algo como certo. É algo que sempre dizem sobre pescadores apressados......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，運氣這種東西，有時是會因為小小的放不開而與你道別的。{n}慌慌張張地去乞討，也太……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，运气这种东西，有时是会因为小小的放不开而与你道别的。{n}慌慌张张地去乞讨，也太……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di certo, la fortuna tende a girare contro le persone che la danno per scontata, anche di pochissimo. Come nel chiedere soldi ansiosamente...

Steam (ST): On many occasions before now, Krauss had gotten cold feet and sold off businesses that would surely have brought in a profit had he just waited, and had, in effect, given away his winning picks.
Umineko Project (UP): On many occasions before now, Krauss had gotten cold feet and sold businesses that would surely have brought in a profit had he just waited, and had, in effect, given away his winning picks.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): On many occasions before now, Krauss had gotten cold feet and sold businesses that would surely have brought in a profit had he just waited, and had, in effect, given away his winning picks.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼はこれまで、じっくり待てば必ず利益が上げられた事業を、いくつも焦って清算し、自ら勝ち馬を降りるような真似をしてきた。
Russian (RU): Во многих случаях Краусс струсил и продал дела, которые обязательно принесли бы прибыль, подожди он немного, и, по сути, отказался от победы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em muitas ocasiões anteriores, Krauss foi pé frio e vendeu negócios que certamente teriam trazido muito mais lucro se ele tivesse esperado, e, efetivamente, desperdiçou seus azarões.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 藏臼之前因心焦而清算掉了，許多只要慢慢等就必定會獲利的事業，一直是在自行跳下會獲勝的馬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 藏臼之前因心焦而清算掉了，许多只要慢慢等就必定会获利的事业，一直是在自行跳下会获胜的马。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In molte occasioni prima di questa, Krauss si era intimidito e aveva venduto affari che gli avrebbero sicuramente portato un profitto se avesse aspettato, e aveva, effettivamente, regalato le sue scelte vincenti.

Steam (ST): Natsuhi also knew this. She knew that guts were the thing her husband lacked most.
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi also knew this.{n}She knew that guts were the thing her husband lacked most.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi also knew this. She knew that guts were the thing her husband lacked most.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃もそれはわかっている。夫にもっとも足りないものが胆力なのだとわかっている。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 夏妃もそれはわかっている。{n}夫にもっとも足りないものが胆力なのだとわかっている。
Russian (RU): Нацухи тоже знала.{n}Она знала, что её мужу больше всего не хватает смелости.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi também sabia disso.{n}Ela sabia que o que mais faltava ao seu marido era coragem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃也明白這一點。{n}她知道，丈夫最缺的就是膽量。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃也明白这一点。{n}她知道，丈夫最缺的就是胆量。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche Natsuhi lo sapeva. Sapeva che ciò che mancava di più a suo marito era il fegato.

Steam (ST): That's why she was unable to refuse when Krauss said he wanted to prudently wait just one more year...
Umineko Project (UP): That was why she was unable to refuse when Krauss said he wanted to prudently wait just one more year......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's why she was unable to refuse when Krauss said he wanted to prudently wait just one more year......
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ、もう１年だけ慎重に行きたいと言う蔵臼のそれを、否定することが出来なかった……。
Russian (RU): Именно поэтому она не смогла отказаться, когда Краусс сказал, что хочет предусмотрительно подождать ещё год......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, ela foi incapaz de recusar quando Krauss disse que ele queria, prudentemente, esperar mais um ano......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以，她沒法否定，藏臼所說的“希望再給一年，慎重行事”……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以，她没法否定，藏臼所说的“希望再给一年，慎重行事”……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ecco perché non era riuscita a rifiutare quando Krauss aveva detto di voler aspettare prudentemente un altro anno...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "...Hahahahahahahaha. How wonderful that things are going well. It would appear I'll have to sit around here as a ghost for a little longer."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Hahahahahahahaha. So wonderful that things are going well. And that means it looks like I'll have to sit around here as a ghost for a little longer."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……はっはははははは。順調で良かったではないか。ということはどうやら、私はもうしばらくここで幽霊を続けねばならぬようだな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……はっはははははは。順調で良かったではないか。ということはどうやら、私はもうしばらくここで幽霊を続けねばならぬようだな」
Russian (RU): "......Ха‐ха‐ха‐ха‐ха. Замечательно, что дела идут в гору. Похоже, мне придётся побыть призраком ещё немного."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Hahahahahahahaha. É tão maravilhoso que tudo esteja correndo bem. E isso significa que terei que ficar sentado aqui como um fantasma por mais um tempo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……哈、哈哈哈哈哈哈。一切順利，不是挺好的嘛。照這麼看來，我還必須在這再多當會兒幽靈呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……哈、哈哈哈哈哈哈。一切顺利，不是挺好的嘛。照这么看来，我还必须在这再多当会儿幽灵呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Hahahahahahahaha. È splendido che le cose stiano andando bene. {n}E ciò significa che dovrò star seduto qui come un fantasma ancora per un po'."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "You don't look too disappointed. You're fated to be chewed to bits by demons the moment you leave this world."
Umineko Project (UP): "You don't look too disappointed. Your life is fated to be chewed to bits by demons as soon as you leave this world."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「まんざらでもなかろうが。そなたの命など、この世を去れば、すぐに悪魔どもに食い尽くされる運命よ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「まんざらでもなかろうが。そなたの命など、この世を去れば、すぐに悪魔どもに食い尽くされる運命よ」
Russian (RU): "Ты не выглядишь разочарованным. Твоей жизни суждено быть разорванной демонами, как только ты покинешь этот мир."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Você não parece muito desapontado. Sua vida está destinada a ser mastigada por demônios assim que deixar este mundo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「雖然這也不壞。但汝的命可是注定會，一離開這個世界，就立即被惡魔們啃個精光的喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「虽然这也不坏。但汝的命可是注定会，一离开这个世界，就立即被恶魔们啃个精光的哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non sembri tanto deluso. La tua vita è destinata ad esser fatta a pezzi dai demoni non appena te ne andrai da questo mondo."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...My apologies, Father. ...For one more year, ...you might not be granted peace."
Umineko Project (UP): "......My apologies, Father. ...For another year, ...you might not be granted peace."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……申し訳ありません、お父様。…また、今年も、…お父様にはお休みいただけないかもしれません。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……申し訳ありません、お父様。…また、今年も、…お父様にはお休みいただけないかもしれません」
Russian (RU): "......Прошу прощения, отец. ...Вы и в этом году... не можете обрести покой."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Eu peço desculpas, pai. ...Por mais um ano, ...não será garantido a você a paz."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……非常抱歉，爸。…今年，…說不定還是沒法令爸安息。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……非常抱歉，爸。…今年，…说不定还是没法令爸安息。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Le mie scuse, Padre. ... Può essere che per un altro anno... non vi sarà concessa la pace."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "It is fine. Fear not, Natsuhi. I am no longer the Ushiromiya Family Head. The ghost of the study should obediently follow the current Head's commands. ...I've taken a look at Krauss's charts, and they aren't bad at all."
Umineko Project (UP): "It is fine. Do not worry, Natsuhi. I am no longer the Ushiromiya family head. The ghost of the study should obediently follow the current head's commands. ......I've taken a look at Krauss's charts, and they aren't bad at all."

Russian (RU): "{p:2:В прошлой игре ты сказала красным, что дед мёртв на начало всех игр. Но ты не упоминала, жив он был или мёртв до их начала. ......В общем, даже если дед сейчас стоит там, противоречий не возникает}."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "{p:2:No último jogo, você disse, em vermelho, que o vovô estava morto desde o início de todos os jogos. Steam (ST): Beato still wore the same sad expression, but she lifted her face... and looked me straight in the eye.
Umineko Project (UP): Beato still wore the same sad expression, but she lifted her face...and looked me right in the eye.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Beato still wore the same sad expression, but she lifted her face... and looked me right in the eye.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトは相変わらずの悲しげな表情だったが、顔を上げる。そしてじっと俺の目を見る。

Steam (ST): Though she was silent, her eyes told me that her pain had subsided.
Umineko Project (UP): Even though she was silent, her eyes told me that the pain had gone away.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Even though she was silent, her eyes told me that the pain had gone away.
PC Japanese (JP): 無言であっても、痛みがなくなったことを、その目で教えてくれた。
Russian (RU): Она молчала, но её глаза сказали мне, что боль прошла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo tendo ficado em silêncio, seu olhar me dizia que sua dor havia sumido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 儘管無言，但她通過雙目告訴了我，疼痛已經消除。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 尽管无言，但她通过双目告诉了我，疼痛已经消除。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Anche se era silenziosa, i suoi occhi mi dicevano che il suo dolore se n'era andato via.

Steam (ST): The feelings that showed in her eyes were gratitude for taking the pain away... ...and appreciation...or was it surprise? ...For leaving even a tiny bit of leeway for witches to exist.
Umineko Project (UP): The feelings that showed in her eyes were gratitude for taking the pain away, .........and appreciation—or was it surprise?—that I had left even a tiny bit of leeway for witches to exist.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The feelings that showed in her eyes were gratitude for taking the pain away, .........and appreciation...or was it surprise? ...For leaving even a tiny bit of leeway for witches to exist.
PC Japanese (JP): その目に浮かぶのは、痛みを取り除いてくれたことへの感謝の気持ちと、………魔女の存在の余地をわずかに残してくれたことへの、感謝と、驚き…？
Russian (RU): Чувства, которые читались в них, — благодарность за избавление от боли......... и признательность... или же удивление? ...Тому, что я оставил чуть‐чуть простора для ведьм.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O sentimento exibido em seus olhos era de gratidão por ter acabado com a dor, .........e apreciação — ou seria surpresa? — por eu ter deixado uma pequena margem para a existência das bruxas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 浮現在她雙目中的是，對於消除疼痛的感謝之情，………和對於留下了一點點魔女存在餘地的，感激、與吃驚…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 浮现在她双目中的是，对于消除疼痛的感谢之情，………和对于留下了一点点魔女存在余地的，感激、与吃惊…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I sentimenti che mostrava nei suoi occhi erano gratitudine per averle portato via il dolore... e apprezzamento... o era sorpresa?... Per aver lasciato anche solo un angoletto in cui le streghe potessero esistere.

Steam (ST): Unable to look directly at those pure eyes of hers, I reflexively averted my gaze.
Umineko Project (UP): Unable to look directly at those pure eyes of hers, I automatically averted my gaze.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Unable to look directly at those pure eyes of hers, I automatically averted my gaze.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Incapaz de olhar diretamente para aqueles olhos puros, eu automaticamente desviei meu olhar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我無法直視她無垢的瞳孔，不由自主地轉移了目光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我无法直视她无垢的瞳孔，不由自主地转移了目光。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non riuscendo a guardare direttamente quei suoi occhi puri, volsi automaticamente il mio sguardo.

Russian (RU): "......Не пойми неправильно. Я не собираюсь признавать ведьм или сдаваться. Просто хочу забыть про эту часть и стоически бороться, чтобы победить в игре против тебя. К тому же, у меня нет желания издеваться над тобой за пределами игровой доски."

Russian (RU): "В то время Такеда воевал с Токугавой и Одой. Известие о его смерти могло негативно сказаться на войне. Поэтому он оставил завещание, написав, что о его смерти три года никто не должен знать. ......Хидэёши сделал то же самое, так? Он был подавлен информацией о смерти господина — Оды Нобунаги — и чтобы враг не узнал, быстро заключил мир с Мори и победил Акети в битве при Ямазаки."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Na época, o Takeda estava em guerra junto com Oda e Tokugawa. Se sua morte se tornasse de conhecimento de todos, provavelmente acabaria tendo um efeito negativo na guerra. Por causa disso, ele deixou um testamento dizendo que sua morte deveria ser mantida em segredo por três anos. ......O Hideyoshi fez a mesma coisa, não? Ele abafou completamente a morte de seu mestre, Oda Nobunaga, para que o inimigo não descobrisse, rapidamente se reconciliou com Mouri e derrotou Akechi na Batalha de Yamazaki."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「當時，武田與織田、德川戰得正酣。要是在這關頭傳出信玄的死訊，將會對戰況造成不利影響吧。所以吶，他留下遺言，要求把自己的死訊藏上 3 年。……秀吉也是這麼做的吶。為了不令敵方知道主君織田信長之死，徹底封鎖住了情報，迅速與毛利和解，從{c:86EF9C:中國}大撤軍，討伐了明智吶。{c:86EF9C:（詳見魔導書同名條目）}」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「当时，武田与织田、德川战得正酣。要是在这关头传出信玄的死讯，将会对战况造成不利影响吧。所以呐，他留下遗言，要求把自己的死讯藏上 3 年。……秀吉也是这么做的呐。为了不令敌方知道主君织田信长之死，彻底封锁住了情报，迅速与毛利和解，从{c:86EF9C:中国}大撤军，讨伐了明智呐。{c:86EF9C:（详见魔导书同名条目）}」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "A quel tempo, Takeda era nel bel mezzo di una guerra tra Oda e Tokugawa. {n}Se si fosse venuti a conoscenza della sua morte in un momento come quello, probabilmente avrebbe avuto un effetto negativo sulla guerra. A causa di ciò, lasciò un testamento dicendo che la sua morte sarebbe dovuta essere tenuta segreta per tre anni. ... Hideyoshi fece la stessa cosa, no? Nascose completamente qualunque informazione riguardo la morte del suo padrone, Oda Nobunaga, in modo che i nemici non lo scoprissero, fece velocemente pace con Mouri, e sconfisse Akechi nella Battaglia di Yamazaki."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "I've never been a fan of doing work based on trust. It takes hard work to build up trust, but only an instant to lose it. There's no less profitable investment."
Umineko Project (UP): "I never want to do business based on trust. It takes hard work to build up trust, but only an instant to lose it. There's no less profitable investment."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I never like to work based on trust. It takes hard work to build up trust, but only an instant to lose it. There's no less profitable investment."
PC Japanese (JP): 「つくづく、信用で仕事をしたくないものだわ。信用ほど、積み上げるのに苦労して、失う時が一瞬なんて、割の合わない投資はない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「つくづく、信用で仕事をしたくないものだわ。信用ほど、積み上げるのに苦労して、失う時が一瞬なんて、割の合わない投資はない」
Russian (RU): "Мне никогда не нравилось работать, основываясь на доверии. Трудно построить доверительные отношения, зато слишком легко потерять их. Есть не менее выгодные инвестиции."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说来真是，不想靠信用来工作呢。再也没有比“功者难成而易败”的信用更不划算的投资了。」

Russian (RU): Но всё равно...... это может быть её единственный за всю жизнь шанс расплатиться по крупным долгам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo assim, ......era uma chance de pagar suas inúmeras dívidas, uma oportunidade daquelas que só acontece uma vez na vida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但即便如此，……這可是個能還掉巨額欠款的，千載難逢的機會。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但即便如此，……这可是个能还掉巨额欠款的，千载难逢的机会。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciononostante... questa potrebbe essere la sua possibilità che capita una volta nella vita per pagare i suoi grossi debiti.

Steam (ST): Rosa took a notebook out of her handbag... and started to mark the day she'd be meeting with Rudolf and Eva. ...Then, she frowned and smacked herself hard in the forehead.
Umineko Project (UP): Rosa took a notebook out of her handbag, and went to fill in the day she would be meeting with Rudolf and Eva. ......Then she frowned and smacked herself hard in the forehead.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa took a notebook out of her handbag and started to fill in the day she would be meeting with Rudolf and Eva. ......Then she frowned and smacked herself hard in the forehead.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座はハンドバッグから手帳を取り出し、留弗夫たちとの打ち合わせ日を記入しようとする。……そして顔をしかめ、額を強く叩いた。
Russian (RU): Роза вытащила из сумки записную книжку и начала заполнять день встречи с Евой и Рудольфом. ......Она нахмурилась и хлопнула себя по лбу.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela tirou uma agenda de sua bolsa, e tratou de marcar o dia em que iria se encontrar com Rudolf e Eva. ......Rosa franziu a testa e bateu com a mesma contra na parede.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座從手提包中取出一本小冊子，想要寫上與留弗夫他們碰面的日子。……然後，眉頭一皺，重重地拍了下自己的腦門。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座从手提包中取出一本小册子，想要写上与留弗夫他们碰面的日子。……然后，眉头一皱，重重地拍了下自己的脑门。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rosa prese un'agenda dalla sua borsa e iniziò a riempire la pagina del giorno in cui avrebbe incontrato Rudolf ed Eva. ... Allora aggrottò le sopracciglia e si colpì violentemente la fronte.

Steam (ST): Because written there was "DZL with Maria", ...something she had planned to do with her daughter.
Umineko Project (UP): Because written there was "DZL with Maria".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because written there was 'DZL with Maria'......something she had planned to do with her daughter.
PC Japanese (JP): そこには、「真里亞とＤＺＬ」と、……娘との予定が記されていたからだ。
Russian (RU): На странице уже было написано 'ДСЛ с Марией'...... У неё уже были планы с дочерью.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porque estava escrito "DZL com a Maria".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在那一頁上，寫著「與真里亞去 DZL」的，……與女兒的行程預定。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在那一页上，写着「与真里亚去 DZL」的，……与女儿的行程预定。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché là c'era scritto ‘DZL con Maria’... qualcosa che aveva progettato di fare con la figlia.

Steam (ST): Maria was in her room, playing around excitedly with Sakutarou and the others.
Umineko Project (UP): Maria was in her room, playing around excitedly with Sakutarou and the others.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria was in her room, playing around excitedly with Sakutarou and the others.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は自室で、さくたろうたちとはしゃいでいる。
Russian (RU): Мария была в комнате — взволнованно играла с Сакутаро и остальными.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria estava em seu quarto, brincando alegremente com Sakutarou e seus outros bichinhos de pelúcia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞正在自己的房間與櫻太郎開心玩鬧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚正在自己的房间与樱太郎开心玩闹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Maria era nella sua stanza, giocando vivacemente con Sakutarou e gli altri.

Steam (ST): That was because she was going to go to that recently-built amusement park, Delzney Land, the following Sunday...
Umineko Project (UP): It was because her mother was going to take her to the amusement park that had just been built, Delsney Land, on Sunday......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was because she was going to be taken to the amusement park that had just been created, Delsney Land, the following Sunday......
PC Japanese (JP): 次の日曜日に、出来たばかりの遊園地、デルゼニーランドに連れて行ってもらえることになっているからだ……。
Russian (RU): Ведь в следующее воскресенье её отведут в только что построенный парк развлечений, Дэлснейленд.....
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Isso porque sua mãe iria levá‐la a um parque de diversões que tinha acabado de ser inaugurado, Delsney Land, no domingo......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而這是因為，在下個周日，媽媽會帶她去剛開的游樂園，迪爾澤尼樂園玩……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而这是因为，在下个周日，妈妈会带她去刚开的游乐园，迪尔泽尼乐园玩……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché sarebbe stata portata al parco divertimenti che era stato appena creato, Delsney Land, la domenica successiva...

Steam (ST): Looking at the clock, Rosa saw that it was just past 9:00 at night. Maria was breaking the lights out rule.
Umineko Project (UP): Looking at the clock, Rosa saw that it was just past nine o'clock at night.{n}Maria was breaking the lights‐out rule.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Looking at the clock, Rosa saw that it was just past 9:00 at night. Maria was breaking the lights out rule.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計を見ると、もう夜の９時を過ぎていた。それは、消灯のルールの違反だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 時計を見ると、もう夜の９時を過ぎていた。{n}それは、消灯のルールの違反だ。
Russian (RU): Посмотрев на часы, Роза заметила, что уже больше 9 вечера.{n}Мария нарушила правило выключения света.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Olhando para o relógio, Rosa viu que já havia passado das nove horas da noite.{n}Maria estava quebrando a regra de desligar as luzes.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看了下時鐘，已過晚上 9 點。{n}真里亞違反了熄燈的規矩。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看了下时钟，已过晚上 9 点。{n}真里亚违反了熄灯的规矩。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Guardando l'orologio, Rosa vide che erano le 9:00 di sera passate. Maria non stava rispettando la regola del coprifuoco.

Steam (ST): After covering her face and agonizing for a while, ...Rosa stood up and stomped over to Maria's room.
Umineko Project (UP): After covering her face and agonizing for a while, ......Rosa stood up and stomped over to Maria's room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): After covering her face and agonizing for a while, ......Rosa stood up and stomped over to Maria's room.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は顔を覆いながら、しばらくの間、悩みこんだ後、……すくっと立ち上がり、踵を踏み鳴らしながら真里亞の部屋へ向かっていく。
Russian (RU): Некоторое время просидев в тоске, закрыв лицо руками...... Роза встала и пошла к её комнате.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após cobrir seu rosto e agonizar por um momento, ......Rosa se levantou e foi bater no quarto de Maria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座捂著臉，苦惱了一會兒後，……“嚯”地站起身來，把腳後跟蹬得砰砰響地，向真里亞的房間走去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座捂着脸，苦恼了一会儿后，……“嚯”地站起身来，把脚后跟蹬得砰砰响地，向真里亚的房间走去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dopo aver coperto la sua faccia e sofferto per un momento... Rosa si alzò e corse verso la stanza di Maria.

Steam (ST): The room would probably be a mess as well. ...At least tonight, that was convenient.
Umineko Project (UP): The room was almost certainly a mess as well.{n}......At least tonight, that was convenient.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The room was almost certainly a mess as well. ......At least tonight, that was convenient.
PC Japanese (JP): きっと、部屋も散らかしているだろう。……それは今夜に限り、好都合だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): きっと、部屋も散らかしているだろう。{n}……それは今夜に限り、好都合だった。
Russian (RU): Там почти наверняка был беспорядок.{n}......По крайней мере сегодня так даже лучше.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O quarto muito provavelmente estava bagunçado.{n}......Ao menos essa noite, foi conveniente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 房間也一定是搞得很亂了吧。{n}……這在今晚來說，是再好不過了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 房间也一定是搞得很乱了吧。{n}……这在今晚来说，是再好不过了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Di sicuro, anche la stanza era in disordine. ... Almeno quella notte, era conveniente.

Steam (ST): As she stood outside the door to Maria's room, listening to the happy laughter seeping through, Rosa's face twisted in anguish once again, and she looked at the floor.
Umineko Project (UP): As she stood outside the door to Maria's room, listening to the happy laughter seeping through, Rosa's face twisted in anguish once again, and she looked at the floor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As she stood outside the door to Maria's room, listening to the happy laughter seeping through, Rosa's face twisted in anguish once again, and she looked at the floor.
PC Japanese (JP): 上機嫌な笑い声が漏れ聞こえる真里亞の部屋の扉の前に立ち、楼座は一度、苦悩で顔を歪めて俯く。
Russian (RU): Пока она стояла за дверью в комнату Марии, слушая счастливый смех, просачивающийся через дверь, лицо Розы снова скривилось в тоске, и она опустила взгляд.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Enquanto permanecia do lado de fora do quarto de Maria, ouvindo a animada risada que escorregava para fora, o rosto de Rosa se distorceu em angústia mais uma vez, e ela redirecionou seu olhar para o chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 站在能聽到從中傳出的興高采烈的笑聲的真里亞房間的門前，樓座一度因苦惱而扭曲了表情，低下了頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 站在能听到从中传出的兴高采烈的笑声的真里亚房间的门前，楼座一度因苦恼而扭曲了表情，低下了头。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Stando fuori dalla stanza di Maria, ascoltando la felice risata che filtrava dalla porta, la faccia di Rosa si contorse nuovamente dall'angoscia, e guardò il pavimento.

Steam (ST): Then, when she raised her head again, her brow was furrowed, and her face had become an ugly expression of anger...
Umineko Project (UP): Then, when she raised her head again, her brow was furrowed, and her face had become an ugly expression of anger...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, when she raised her head again, her brow was furrowed, and her face had become an ugly expression of anger...
PC Japanese (JP): そしてもう一度、顔を上げた時には、眉間にしわを寄せた、醜悪な憤怒の表情になっていた…。
Russian (RU): Как только она опять подняла голову, её лоб сморщился, а на лице появилось уродливое выражение гнева...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, ela ergueu sua cabeça novamente, suas sobrancelhas franziram e seu rosto assumiu uma horrenda expressão de raiva...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，在她再次抬起臉時，擺在臉上的，已是緊鎖著眉間的，醜惡、憤怒的神情…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，在她再次抬起脸时，摆在脸上的，已是紧锁着眉间的，丑恶、愤怒的神情…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, quando rialzò la testa, la sua fronte era corrugata, e la sua faccia era diventata un'orrenda espressione di rabbia...

Steam (ST): The weather wasn't that great.
Umineko Project (UP): The weather wasn't looking very good.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The weather wasn't that great.
PC Japanese (JP): 空模様はあまりよくない。
Russian (RU): Погода была не слишком хорошая.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O tempo não estava dos melhores.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 天色不太好。
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il tempo non era così bello.

Steam (ST): According to the weekend forecast, a certain tropical cyclone would likely grow into a large typhoon.
Umineko Project (UP): The weekend forecast had said that there was a high likelihood of a tropical cyclone growing into a large typhoon.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The weekend forecast had said that there was a high likelihood of a tropical cyclone growing into a large typhoon.
PC Japanese (JP): 週間予報では、熱帯低気圧が大きな台風に成長する可能性が高いと伝えていた。
Russian (RU): В прогнозе на выходные сказали, что высока вероятность возникновения тропического циклона, который перерастёт в сильный тайфун.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A previsão do tempo para a semana informou que havia uma alta possibilidade de um ciclone tropical se transformar em um grande tufão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 周間預報播報了，熱帶低氣壓極有可能成長為大型台風。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 周间预报播报了，热带低气压极有可能成长为大型台风。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le previsioni per il fine settimana avevano detto che ci sarebbe stata un'alta probabilità che un ciclone tropicale sarebbe diventato un forte tifone.

Steam (ST): If unhappy premonitions tend to be right...
Umineko Project (UP): If it was true that premonitions tended to be right...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If unhappy premonitions tend to be right...
PC Japanese (JP): 不愉快な予感が大抵当たるのなら。
Russian (RU): Если дурные предчувствия себя оправдают...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se era realmente verdade que premonições tendem a se concretizar...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果不愉快的預感大抵是對的的話，
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果不愉快的预感大抵是对的的话，
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se le premonizioni infelici tendono ad avverarsi...

Steam (ST): ...This year's family conference will probably take place in absolutely horrible weather.
Umineko Project (UP): ......then this year's family conference would probably take place in absolutely horrible weather.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......This year's family conference will probably take place in absolutely horrible weather.
PC Japanese (JP): ……恐らく、今年の親族会議は、最悪の天気の中で行なわれることになるだろう。
Russian (RU): ......Семейное собрание этого года состоится в абсолютно ужасных погодных условиях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......então a conferência familiar deste ano ocorreria em meio a um clima horrível.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……恐怕，今年的親族會議，會在最糟的天氣中召開吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……恐怕，今年的亲族会议，会在最糟的天气中召开吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... La riunione familiare di quest'anno si sarebbe probabilmente tenuta con un tempo assolutamente orribile.

Steam (ST): No, I wish a typhoon large enough to stop all boat travel would seal Rokkenjima away forever.
Umineko Project (UP): In fact, Natsuhi wished that a typhoon large enough to stop boat travel to the island would seal Rokkenjima away forever.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No, I wish that a typhoon large enough to stop boat travel to the island would seal Rokkenjima away forever.
PC Japanese (JP): いや、いっそ、船が欠航するほどの台風が、六軒島を永遠に閉ざしてくれないものか。
Russian (RU): Вот бы тайфун оказался достаточно сильным, чтобы катер не смог приехать и Роккенджима навсегда был оторван от внешнего мира.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na verdade, Natsuhi desejava que o tufão fosse forte o bastante para impedir o barco de viajar até Rokkenjima e selar a ilha para sempre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不，索性就來場大到能令船停航的台風，把六軒島永遠地封閉起來吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不，索性就来场大到能令船停航的台风，把六轩岛永远地封闭起来吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, spero che un tifone abbastanza forte da bloccare i viaggi in nave sigilli Rokkenjima per sempre.

Steam (ST): If that happened, I'd be able to hide Kinzo's death as long as I wanted...
Umineko Project (UP): If that happened, she would be able to keep Kinzo's death hidden as long as she wanted......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If that happened, I'd be able to hide Kinzo's death as long as I wanted......
PC Japanese (JP): そうすれば、金蔵の死をいつまでも隠し果せることが出来るのだが……。
Russian (RU): Так я могла бы скрывать смерть Кинзо сколько захочу......
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se isso acontecesse, ela seria capaz de manter a morte de Kinzo em segredo por quanto tempo desejasse......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這樣的話，就能把金藏的死永遠地藏下去了……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这样的话，就能把金藏的死永远地藏下去了……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se succedesse, riuscirei a nascondere la morte di Kinzo fin quanto vorrei...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "If only...the typhoon would keep them at bay forever."
Umineko Project (UP): "If only......the typhoon would keep them at bay forever."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "If only, ......the typhoon would keep them at bay forever."
PC Japanese (JP): 「台風が、……彼らを永遠に遠ざけてくれればいいのに。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「台風が、……彼らを永遠に遠ざけてくれればいいのに」
Russian (RU): "Вот бы...... тайфун вечно держал их на расстоянии."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Se apenas......o tufão os mantivesse distantes pelo resto da eternidade."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「台風，……要是能永遠地將他們遠遠隔開就好了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「台风，……要是能永远地将他们远远隔开就好了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Se solo... il tifone li tenesse a bada per sempre."

Steam (ST): Natsuhi let out a deep sigh. ...Just doing that made her headache throb...
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi let out a deep sigh. ......Just doing that made her headache throb...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 大きく溜息を漏らす夏妃。……溜息をつくだけでも、頭痛に障る…。
Russian (RU): Нацухи глубоко вздохнула. ......От этого в голову вступило ещё сильнее...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi suspirou profundamente. ......O simples ato de fazer isso já atiçava suas dores de cabeça...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃長吁了一口氣。……僅僅是嘆口氣，都會觸發頭疼…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃长吁了一口气。……仅仅是叹口气，都会触发头疼…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Natsuhi emise un profondo sospiro. ... Solo quell'azione fece pulsare la sua testa dolorante...

Steam (ST): As the day of the family conference approached, the intensity of her headache just kept on increasing.
Umineko Project (UP): As the day of the family conference approached, the intensity of her headache just kept on increasing.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As the day of the family conference approached, the intensity of her headache just kept on increasing.
PC Japanese (JP): 親族会議の日程が近付くにつれ、頭痛は酷さを増すばかりだった。
Russian (RU): С приближением семейного собрания интенсивность её головных болей только продолжала расти.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com o dia da conferência familiar se aproximando, a intensidade de suas dores continuava a aumentar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 隨著親族會議的那一天的接近，頭痛一個勁地越來越嚴重。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着亲族会议的那一天的接近，头痛一个劲地越来越严重。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come il giorno della riunione familiare si avvicinava, l'intensità della sua emicrania continuava ad aumentare.

Steam (ST): At that time, the phone rang. Natsuhi turned the TV off and picked up the receiver...
Umineko Project (UP): At that time, the phone rang.{n}Natsuhi turned the television off and picked up the receiver...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At that time, the phone rang. Natsuhi turned the TV off and picked up the receiver...
PC Japanese (JP): その時、電話が鳴った。夏妃はテレビを消し、受話器を取る…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その時、電話が鳴った。{n}夏妃はテレビを消し、受話器を取る…。
Russian (RU): В этот момент зазвонил телефон.{n}Нацухи выключила телевизор и подняла трубку...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele momento, o telefone tocou.{n}Natsuhi desligou a televisão e pegou o aparelho de telefone...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就在這時，電話響了。{n}夏妃關了電視，拿起話筒…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就在这时，电话响了。{n}夏妃关了电视，拿起话筒…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel momento, il telefono squillò. Natsuhi spense la TV e prese la cornetta...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...Hello?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Pronto?"

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "I apologize for calling during your rest. It is Genji."
Umineko Project (UP): "I apologize for calling during your rest. It is Genji."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「お休みのところ、申し訳ございません。源次でございます。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お休みのところ、申し訳ございません。源次でございます」
Russian (RU): "Простите, что беспокою. Это Генджи."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Peço desculpas por ligar durante seu descanso. É o Genji."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「打擾您的休息，非常抱歉。我是源次。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「打扰您的休息，非常抱歉。我是源次。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mi scusi per aver chiamato durante il suo riposo. Sono Genji."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "Is something the matter...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Is something the matter...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Umineko Project (UP): After remaining silent for a little longer, the man finally answered......

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Após permanecer em silêncio por mais um momento, o homem finalmente respondeu......

Chinese Simplified (CN): 沉默又持续了一段时间后，那位男子终于开口了……。

PC Japanese (JP): 青年くらいの男に感じられるが、案外、中学生くらいの男子かもしれないし、まだまだ声に張りを持つ壮年男性かもしれない。
Russian (RU): Может, это молодой человек, может, мальчик школьного возраста, а может, взрослый мужчина с неуглубившимся голосом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela soava como um jovem adulto, mas também poderia estar no ensino médio, ou ser um adulto na qual a voz ainda não havia amadurecido.

Steam (ST): However, one thing was certain... Natsuhi could think of no one who would speak to her in an overly familiar manner like this...
Umineko Project (UP): However, one thing was certain...... Though this person spoke to Natsuhi in such a familiar and casual manner, Natsuhi had absolutely no clue who it was...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, the one thing was certain...... Though this person spoke to Natsuhi in such a familiar and casual manner, Natsuhi had absolutely no clue who it was...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、確実に言えることは……、こんな馴れ馴れしい口調で話す人物に心当たりはないということだった…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, uma coisa era certa...... Embora essa pessoa estivesse falando com Natsuhi em um tom familiar e casual, ela não tinha absolutamente nenhuma ideia de quem era...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 能夠確鑿無誤地說出來的是……，對於會以這種套近乎的口吻說話之人，自己沒有一丁點的頭緒…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 能够确凿无误地说出来的是……，对于会以这种套近乎的口吻说话之人，自己没有一丁点的头绪…。

Umineko Project (UP): "......It'd be easy for me to tell you my name. ......But that would make me very sad."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "I don't know what you're talking about. Who are you? And what business do you have with me?! If you can't tell me that, I'm not interested! I'm hanging up...!"

Steam (ST): That unsettling word thrust itself mercilessly into the depths of Natsuhi's heart and started churning it about...
Umineko Project (UP): That unsettling word thrust itself mercilessly into the depths of Natsuhi's heart and started churning it about...

Original Witch Hunt (OG): In her entire life, Natsuhi had never once been told something so unsettling.

Umineko Project (UP): In her bewilderment, Natsuhi felt her heart beat so loudly that it felt like it would explode.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In her bewilderment, Natsuhi felt her heart beat so loudly that it felt like it would explode.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em total perplexidade, Natsuhi sentiu seu coração bater tão aceleradamente que parecia que iria explodir.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "I...I-I have no idea what you're talking about! I don't know what you're planning, but I'm hanging up...!!"

Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I, ......I, I don't remember someone like you ever calling me Mother! I don't know what you're thinking, but I'm hanging up...!!"

Russian (RU): "Я...... я... не помню, чтобы вы называли меня матерью! Не знаю, что вы задумали, но я вешаю трубку!.."
